details.purpose: Generation of scripts for running telemac simulations on a PBS system.
features: Assigns a job name and number of processors.
Counts the number of processors using the PBS_NODEFILE.
Creates mpirun.txt and mpi_telemac.conf files for parallel execution.
Starts the telemac code with specified parameters.
Checks for running processes after completion.
details.output: jobname.pbs script and Telemac simulation output files
